title.en: Prayer for this Life, the Next and the Bardos

text.en: Vimalamitra, who realized the maṇḍala of the supreme state,
text.en-trans: sa chok kyilkhor ngöngyur bi ma la

text.en: Longchenpa, who revealed the dharmakāya Samantabhadra,
And Pema Ledrel Tsal, to you I pray:
text.en-trans: pema ledrel tsal la solwa deb

text.en: Hold me with compassion in this life, the next, and the bardo state!
text.en-trans: di chi bardo sum la tukjé zung

text.en: When the luminosity of the first bardo state arises,
May I recognise it, perfect the strength and gain stability,
text.en-trans: ngoshé tsal dzok tenpa tob né kyang

text.en: Then, awakening in basic space with its six special features,1
text.en-trans: khyechö drukden ying su changchub né

text.en: May I gain stability in the youthful vase body!
When the saṃbhogakāya appearances that are rigpa's expression arise,
May I find certainty, just like a child entering its mother's lap,
text.en-trans: ma pang bu juk tabü deng tob ching

text.en: And, realizing the key point of engaging with lights and awareness,
text.en-trans: ö dang rigpa jukpé né tong né

text.en: May I attain buddhahood in saṃbhogakāya form!
text.en-trans: longchö dzokpé ku ru sangye shok

text.en: When the karmic bardo of becoming arises,
Then, through relying upon the five means of enlightenment without meditation,
text.en-trans: ma gom sangye chö ngé lam ten né

text.en: In a pure realm where the great relief of liberation is assured,
text.en-trans: namdrol wuk chen jinpé zhingkham su

text.en: May I attain buddhahood in a single lifetime!
text.en-trans: kyewa chik gi sangye tobpar shok
